summary: In this prequel to 'Stone Cold,' Tom Selleck reprises his role as Jesse Stone, an L.A. cop who relocates to a small town only to find himself immersed in one mystery after the other.
cast: Tom Selleck|Saul Rubinek|Viola Davis|Kohl Sudduth|Polly Shannon|Mike Starr|Britt Robertson|Liisa Repo-Martell|Stephen McHattie|John Beale|Vito Rezza|Stephanie March|Stephen Baldwin|Maria Brooks|McKenzi Scott|Brian Jamieson|Christie MacFadyen|Gil Anderson|Bill Meuse|Agumeuay Nakanakis|Mike Turner|Bubba
keywords: envelope of money|driving cross country|woman bites a man's ear|woman wears lingerie|santa monica california
title: Desenmascarados
